trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Cape Coral
There were no other sightings in Cape Coral on or around January 31st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was pulling onto veterans pkwy and to my left I saw 3 very bright lights. They where spaced a moderate distance apart and they formed a triangle. I had the impression that they were the ends of a large triangle shaped object. They were brighter than helicopter lights but about the normal height you see a helicopter around here. I sat there for a few minutes looking trying to figure out what it was, but had I to go run a errand so I could not watch it longer. I see planes and helicopters all the time around here, but Ive never seen anythign like that before.
Summary: I was about to merge onto veterans pkwy and to my left i saw 3 lights hovering in a tringle shape not moving.
